metadata.title: CVE-2024-49986 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  platform/x86: x86-android-tablets: Fix use after free on platform_device_register() errors  x86_android_tablet_remove() frees the pdevs[] array, so it should not be used after calling x86_android_tablet_remove().  When platform_device_register() fails, store the pdevs[x] PTR_ERR() value into the local ret variable before calling x86_android_tablet_remove() to avoid using pdevs[] after it has been freed.
